import * as React from 'react'; import './index.scss'; const Modal = (props) => { const { difficulty, setDifficulty } = props; const [page, setPage] = React.useState(0); const [difficultySetting, setDifficultySetting] = React.useState(difficulty); const [customHeight, setCustomHeight] = React.useState(9); const [customWidth, setCustomWidth] = React.useState(9); const [customMines, setCustomMines] = React.useState(10); React.useEffect(() => { setDifficulty(difficultySetting); }, [difficultySetting, setDifficulty]) return ( <>

Minesweeper Options

{page === 0 && (
Height Width Mines
setDifficultySetting('beginner')} /> 9 9 10
setDifficultySetting('intermediate')} /> 16 16 40
setDifficultySetting('expert')} /> 16 30 99
setDifficultySetting('custom')} /> setCustomHeight(e.target.value)} type="number" /> setCustomWidth(e.target.value)} type="number" /> setCustomMines(e.target.value)} type="number" />
)}
); } export default Modal;
